statements: DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE reporter = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1000 AND severity >= 5
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Data Breach' AND incident_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE id = 100 AND status = 'resolved';
DELETE FROM siem_logs WHERE log_id = 500 OR source_ip = '192.168.1.10';
DELETE FROM security_incidents WHERE incident_name = 'Malware Attack';
